patterns_discovered: Configuration object design with type-specific parameters
Collision detection with simple sphere overlap
gotchas_discovered: Manual resource disposal required for Three.js objects
Potential performance impact from creating multiple mesh children
recommendations: Consider using object pooling for projectiles to improve performance
Externalize magic numbers like maxAge and opacity calculations
Add more robust type checking for material casting
Implement a more sophisticated collision detection mechanism
Create unit tests for edge cases in projectile behavior
